info.description: Blueprint of all the restfull web-services of SeatUs Application.

tags.name: Ride-Trips
tags.description: All trip/ride operations goes under this cateogry.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password which will be used for log-in.

parameters.name: facebook_token
parameters.description: Facebook access token to link with user account.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email you whish to reset password for.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email you whish to reset password for.

parameters.name: birth_date
parameters.description: Date of birht of user. Format: `YYYY-MM-DD` e.g: 1983-10-29

parameters.name: driver_documents
parameters.description: Previous documents/complete payload must be provided else it'll be considered as deleted.

parameters.name: driver_documents
parameters.description: Previous documents/complete payload must be provided else it'll be considered as deleted.

post.summary: Make friends with facebook and phone numbers

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: `user_id` to see list of particular user (if required)

post.summary: Fetch the list of pending rating.
Identify the ride popularity i.e which route is most popular amoung given routes.

parameters.name: route[0]
parameters.description: Direction API routes in encoded polyline

parameters.name: route[1]
parameters.description: Direction API routes in encoded polyline

post.summary: Calculate the estimation for origin to destination.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: Origin coordinates of the trip. CSV of coordinates

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination coordinates of the trip. CSV of coordinates

post.summary: Create ride by driver, searchable via users (public ride)

parameters.name: origin_latitude
parameters.description: latitude of origin for the trip.

parameters.name: origin_longitude
parameters.description: longitude of origin for the trip.

parameters.name: origin_title
parameters.description: Title of origin for the trip.
parameters.default: Bahadur Shah Zafar Road, Karachi, Pakistan

parameters.name: destination_latitude
parameters.description: latitude of destination for the trip.

parameters.name: destination_longitude
parameters.description: longitude of destination for the trip.

parameters.name: destination_title
parameters.description: Title of destination for the trip.
parameters.default: Allama I. I. Qazi Chowk, Allama I.I. Qazi Chowk, Karachi, Pakistan

parameters.name: expected_distance
parameters.description: Expected distance (in meters) of the trip.

parameters.name: expected_start_date
parameters.description: Expected start date of the trip.

parameters.name: date_returning
parameters.description: Expected start date of the trip.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.description: Undecided/Decided time-range for the trip. Options are: `1`=Morning, `2`=Afternoon, `4`=Night, Add their value upon selction and compare them with bitwise operators.

parameters.name: time_range_returning
parameters.description: Undecided/Decided time-range for the trip. Options are: `1`=Morning, `2`=Afternoon, `4`=Night, Add their value upon selction and compare them with bitwise operators.

parameters.name: seats_total
parameters.description: Define the total available seats of this ride.

parameters.name: seats_total_returning
parameters.description: Enter number of seats of returning trip.

parameters.name: desired_gender
parameters.description: Desired gender. Options are: `1`=Male, `2`=Female, Add their value upon selction and compare them with bitwise operators.

parameters.name: booknow_price
parameters.description: Enter customized book-now price set by driver.

parameters.name: min_estimates
parameters.description: Enter calculated min range in amount.

parameters.name: max_estimates
parameters.description: Enter calculated max range in amount.

parameters.name: stepped_route
parameters.description: Specify the stepped route in encoded polyline

parameters.name: invited_members
parameters.description: User id given for the invited members; seperated by `-,-`

post.summary: Create (Request) ride by passenger, searchable via users (public ride)

parameters.name: origin_latitude
parameters.description: latitude of origin for the trip.

parameters.name: origin_longitude
parameters.description: longitude of origin for the trip.

parameters.name: origin_title
parameters.description: Title of origin for the trip.
parameters.default: Bahadur Shah Zafar Road, Karachi, Pakistan

parameters.name: destination_latitude
parameters.description: latitude of destination for the trip.

parameters.name: destination_longitude
parameters.description: longitude of destination for the trip.

parameters.name: destination_title
parameters.description: Title of destination for the trip.
parameters.default: Allama I. I. Qazi Chowk, Allama I.I. Qazi Chowk, Karachi, Pakistan

parameters.name: expected_distance
parameters.description: Expected distance (in meters) of the trip.

parameters.name: expected_start_date
parameters.description: Expected start date of the trip.

parameters.name: date_returning
parameters.description: Expected start date of the trip.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.description: Undecided/Decided time-range for the trip. Options are: `1`=Morning, `2`=Afternoon, `4`=Night, Add their value upon selction and compare them with bitwise operators.

parameters.name: time_range_returning
parameters.description: Undecided/Decided time-range for the trip. Options are: `1`=Morning, `2`=Afternoon, `4`=Night, Add their value upon selction and compare them with bitwise operators.

parameters.name: seats_total
parameters.description: Define the total available seats of this ride. Required if driver exists.

parameters.name: seats_total_returning
parameters.description: Enter number of seats of returning trip.

parameters.name: desired_gender
parameters.description: Desired gender. Options are: `1`=Male, `2`=Female, Add their value upon selction and compare them with bitwise operators.

parameters.description: Enter calculated min range in amount.

parameters.description: Enter calculated max range in amount.

parameters.name: stepped_route
parameters.description: Specify the stepped route in encoded polyline

parameters.description: User id given for the invited members; seperated by `-,-`
